content:
16:55 Picked a good time to deploy a new website to Github Pages. At this time Github is experiencing service degredation on their Actions and Pages as of 21:31 UTC. So, if you start seeing weird it’s probably because there is in fact some weird.
Github status page is listed below for anyone that wants to follow along.
Github Status Page Last I checked it was just Actions that was having problems. Kind of defeats the purpose to report this on something hosted on Github Pages. But… suprise. If this gets to anyone.
title: Entry 09-16-2024
